mod.name: Default Config
mod.description: The Default Config that comes with XVM

mod.name: Willster419's Config v{version}
mod.updateComment:
2017-11-15: moved hp cirlces from always on to on when left alt pressed (fps issues)
2017-10-01: fixed hp circles to actually by hp circles
2017-09-06: fixed capture bar issues
2017-06-03: changed clock from 24 hour to 12 hour format with am/pm marker. Disabled blocking of stock WoT damage log. Disabled xvm eff in battle.
mod.description: Config by Willster419. Originaly based on stock xvm config.\nIncludes an hp pool and minimap hp circles

mod.name: J1mB0's XVM Config v{version}
mod.description: J1mB0's Config

mod.name: Bones's XVM Config v{version}
mod.description: Bones's Config

config.name: Disable all stats
config.description: Disable stastical information. Overwrites your changes for PlayersPanel Selection

mod.name: OMC XVM Config v{version}
mod.description: OMC XVM Config. Offers many of the options that were first in the OMC config.

config.name: Enable Quick Color Marker (Quickstat)
config.description: from left to right: WN8, EFF, global winrate, winrate on the current tank

mod.name: Solo XVM Config v{version}
mod.description: Solo XVM Config

config.name: Minimap HP When press left alt

mod.name: Clan Icons
mod.description: all clan icons from 04/02/2017

config.name: 6th sense - Icon Duration
config.description: Configure how long the 6th sense icon stays on your screen.\nIf you later select 6th sense settings in the 6th sense tab, this is automaticaly turned off.

config.name: Information Label for Missions (Mission Tracker)
config.description:
This label positioned under the left PlayersPanel shows you many informations you need for missions or for your daily games too. 
Examples for that are your damage, damage of your platoon members, damage of you and your platoon members together, number of enemys you spotted, number of critical hits you made, number of enemys your complete platoon killed, damage through reconnaissance and chain destruction, damage through spotting only, damage through chain destruction only, damage you got, hits you got and damage you blocked. 

Information Label for Missions by MarsOne: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/340002-09151-omc-modpack-installer-mit-bild-video-vorschau-letztes-update-siehe-wwwodemmortiscom/page__st__4980__pid__13912513#entry13912513

config.name: Scoreboard
config.description: Configure the scoreboard (the topmost interface component showing both teams alive or dead tanks)

config.name: Show Alive
config.description: Show the number of tanks alive.

config.name: Show Kills
config.description: Show the number of tanks killed.

config.name: Hitlog
config.description: Toggle the xvm hitlog (Shows a log of total damage you have caused for the duration of the game)

config.name: Total HP
config.description: Shows the total combined hp of each team. Commonly under the scoreboard, in the format "our hp > their hp".

config.name: WN8 Comparison
config.description: Shows the total WN8 values of each team. In the similar format of "Total HP" (the setting above).

config.name: High Caliber Tracker
config.description: Shows how much damage you need to do to get high caliber

config.name: Win Chance [Disabled by XVM]
config.description: Show the percent chance of winning in the battle when you press tab

config.name: Damage Log
config.description: Toggle the xvm damage log. The damage log shows how much damage you have taken for the duration of the battle.

config.name: Enable toggling of client default damagelog from game settings
config.description: Enabling this will allow you to configure the ingame damagelog and hitlog settings from the client settings window.

config.name: Last Hit Announcer
config.description: Will display a message of who just shot you and for how much. Similar to the damage announce part of the popular "Damagelog by GambitER".

config.name: Vehicle On Fire Announcer
config.description: (Another) Visual notification if your vehicle is on fire.

config.name: Total Efficiency
config.description: Shows spotting damage, assistance damage, stun damage, etc.

config.name: Damage Panel Repair Timers
config.description: Shows a number in the picture of the damaged modules in the players panel of how much time until the item is repaired.

mod.name: Battle Results modifications (xvm)
mod.description:
Show the tier of the battle (max tier)
also change which results page is displayed first when you enter the garage from the battle
page 1 is battle summary
page 2 is teams score
page 3 is your detailed battle stats

config.name: Show Battle Tier
config.description: Show the battle tier in the results window.

config.name: Hide Battle Tier
config.description: Hide the battle tier in the results window.

config.name: Init Battle Results page 1
config.description: Show the first tab in the results page. (Game summary)

config.name: Init Battle Results page 2
config.description: Show the second tab in the results page. (Total team information)

config.name: Init Battle Results page 3
config.description: Show the third tab in the results page. (Battle finances report)

config.name: Clock

config.description: Change the default form of currency for purchasing shells, consumables, etc.

config.name: Tech Tree free XP convert option
config.description: Enable an option where, when trying to research a module or tank, if you do not have enough xp, it will present you with a window to convert enough free xp to research the item

config.description: Automatically return your crew between tanks

config.description:
Left shield - nationality: 
Yellow - UK; Light Green - USA; Red - USSR; Gray - Germany; Blue - France; Green - China; White - Japan; Navy blue - Czechoslovakia; Teal - Sweden 
Icon Color - type of tank: Bronze - Heavy Tank; Green - Medium Tank; Light bronze - Light Tank; Red - SPG; Blue - Tank Destroyer 
Right numbers - Armor points(Front/Side/Back) 
Yellow Star - Premium indicator

mod.name: Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Indicators
mod.description: Shows wether or not you can penetrate an enemy, in the form of showing the number

config.name: PMOD Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Indicator
config.description: Shows wether or not you can penetrate an enemy, factoring in armor angles and normalization, in the form\n avg_gun_penetration/enemy_effective_armor

config.name: Number Indicator of Armor Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) (non-PMOD)
config.description: Shows a number of chance of penetration. The number is calculated by (enemy_effective_armor-gun_average_penetration).\nNegative number means likely to bounce.\nPositive number means likely to pierce.

mod.name: Zoom modifications - zoom in (pmod)
mod.description: Allows you to change the ammount that you can zoom in.\nDefault zoom changes the first zoom in when you go to sniper mode\ntd brake allows you to change wether the tank moves when you point your gun out of gun range

mod.description: Removes the shadow and green effect from the scope

mod.name: Arty Splash Sphere by Spoter
mod.description:
this will draw a sphere marking the stun area

Legal Info from WG employe Dance210:
Hey Silvers_,

We are currently working on the creation of a process that will more formally vet mods.

In the meantime, I do not personally feel that the mod you are asking about specifically violates the guidelines listed in the fair play policy. That said, those could change in the future and we do not recommend the use of any third-party mods, especially ones that may eventually be determined to provide an unfair information advantage.

config.name: Autoaim indication
config.updateComment: 2017-10-29: this mod breaks the "shot with second turret" in halloween game mode.
config.description: Allows you to auto aim onto a visable target (red outline) when you right click.\n\nLocks onto a target when manually highlighted, so it is legal now.

config.name: 2 sec autoaim search
config.description: Search allows the player to right click and for 2 seconds it will snap on the first highlighted enemy.

config.name: 5 sec autoaim search
config.description: Search allows the player to right click and for 5 seconds it will snap on the first highlighted enemy.

config.name: infinite autoaim search
config.description: Search allows the player to right click, it will snap on the first highlighted enemy.

config.name: lock shell travel distance when enemy dissapeared add-on (use BalCalcMod)
Autoaim Indicator Extended v{version}
config.description:
Using auto-aiming is very useful, especially when you start someone to twist or just the target stands and does not move. Grabbing it you no longer need to drive with your mouse and try to aim your gun at it. The majority of tankmen learned about this miracle of the invention after the introduction of the regime of tank racing. 

Often, in serious mixes, taking someone on an auto-target, you can forget whom you are keeping on the fly and this often does not have a very good effect on your effectiveness, because you can not shoot where you want to. In order to always be aware of what kind of goal is captured in your sight, there is a Mod: Indicator - an extended indication of this Mod. With his help, not to see the captured goal will be simply impossible.

By setting the mode of the extended auto-target display, you will see the following alerts on the captured target:
- on the captured tank will be included a constant stroke of the contour
- around will appear a semitransparent energy field
- if the target you capture suddenly leaves your field of vision, the arrow on the right or left will show directions and distance to it

The color of the energy field indicator changes in the mod settings in the hangar. Available colors are shown in the row below. 

Color options:
- blue
- brown
- chocolate
- cornflower blue
- cream
- blue cyan
- emerald
- golden
- green
- yellow-green
- hot pink
- lime
- orange
- pink
- purple
- red
- WG Backlight
- WG enemy
- WG friendly
- WG platoon
- yellow

mod.name: SafeShot
mod.description: legal info\nhttp://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/599621-wg-support-safeshot-is-illegal/page__st__20__pid__13403197#entry13403197\nprevents you from shooting your gun to hit allies/dead tanks/etc.

config.name: send team damage message in chat

mod.name: BalCalcMod
mod.description: The mod is designed to remedy the situation where it is impossible to aim above the hill. (Overshooting)

mod.name: Wide Border of Maps
mod.description:
Mod is made to help people with color blindness. The line, that indicates the border of maps, is expanded to the edges of the map. Now don't notice her is almost impossible. "Full" and "Light" differ only in the degree of compressibility. 
WIDE - the border of maps is expanded to the edges of the map. INTENSIVE - the border of maps is made in the thickness of 20 pixels (on the standard = 1 pixel).
GRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 10x10. EXTRAGRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 50x50.
COMMAND - into the version "GRID" added the big numbering squares card. SPG - into the version "GRID" added the small numbering squares card.

mod.name: 15m Spot Circle (Type set in garage)
mod.description: Shows a 15m Circle around your tank. Its the minimum distance behind bushes if you are shooting you stay hidden. In the sniper scope ring is not displayed

mod.name: Crew Skill Informer
mod.description: Crew Skill Informer is WoT mod to visualize crews skills and perks meanwhile the battle. Activate it by pressing backspace

mod.name: Marking Industructable Structures
mod.description: Shows which structures can not be destroyed

mod.name: Gold Visibility Mod by lgfrbcsgo
mod.description: This mod adds a short sparkling effect to penetrating APCR/HEAT hits. Not only will you be able to tell if an enemy tank is shooting gold rounds at your allied tanks (or at you), but also if one of your allies is a gold spammer. This information will help you determining whether to engage or not to engage an enemy.

mod.name: Minimap Gundirection by OldSkool
mod.description: Shows direction where enemies within the draw distance are pointing their guns (on the minimap)\n\nlegal Info: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/598224-fair-play-policy/page__st__1020__pid__13392063#entry13392063

config.name: marsoff
config.updateComment: Part of Harpoon Crosshair by lenya69

mod.name: Inbattle current rating calculation by Ekspoint (Can cause FPS loss)
mod.updateComment:
13/12/2017: Folder structure updated. (0.9.21.0)
10/12/2017:
• Removed WN8,EFF,XWN8,XEFF ratings from the configs (No longer needed)
• Added vxbattleflash v.1.6.1
01/12/2017:
• Fixed background image. (Disabled by default)
20/11/2017:
• Code rewrited.
• Added core (library) for mods (without it will not work).
08/11/2017:
- Fixed color for AVGDMG macro.
- Updated values for XWN8, XEFF, COEF.
02/11/2017: Folder structure updated. (0.9.20.1.2)
29/10/2017: Updated python.
26/10/2017: Folder structure updated. (0.9.20.1.1)
16/10/2017: Fixes.
02/10/2017: Updated ratings values.
24/09/2017: changes with python script for FPS loss
20/09/2017: fixed maingun macro
19/09/2017: Minor fixes. 
PROTANKI: added: factor by DIFF: DIFF (x-factor)
mod.description: Shows your current stats ingame. Live updates in game. Downloads latest expected values from the internet.\nDIFF = Difference between the damage you've done and the average damage expected for the tank you're in. \nEFF = Efficiency is a rating formula that calculates damage dealt,winrate,kills,cap points,cap defense points.

mod.name: Consumables

mod.name: Elkano's Minimap Ping Spam Blocker [Use AntiToxicity mod]
mod.description: Blocks more than 3 pings per 10 seconds

mod.name: Antitoxicity Mod by ShuraBB v{version}
mod.description:
**Please note that not all features are currently implimented into the modpack.**

Fashion features:
Filtering "combat commands" (Attention to the square, Need help, Attack, etc.) 
Filtering messages from commands in the chat 
Filtering the clicks on the minimap 
Filtering the display of commands on the minimap 
Configure the filter restrictions (command type, count, time delay, type of combat) 
Ability to block commands from killed allies 
Setting the flashing time of the highlighted square on the minimap 
Filtering messages in the combat chat 
Filtering the message according to the specified pattern, including using regular expressions
The ability to block the message From dead players 
Autocorrect a message for a given template
Setting the filter limits (number, time delay, type of battle) 
Setting the time of the message display and the time of its "dissolving" 
Ability to completely turn off the chat in the replicas 
Dimensionless "black list" 
Dimension list of friends 
Dynamic platoon 
message filter Customizable filter of pop-up messages in the hangar 
Customizable filter messages in the system channel, including using regular expressions 
Customizable message filter above the minimap 
Customizable message filter above the hardware panel 
About deletion of the message about the destruction of the tank: "The machine is destroyed ..."; 
Disabling the posthumous prompt panel;

config.name: Block minimap spam click after 3 repeats
Block dead allies from clicking the map
Block dead allies from battle chat
Block battle chat spam message after 3 repeats

config.name: JVT Techtree Mod
config.description:
Mainfeatures: 
- 11 different Layout options (8 vertical, 3 horizontal) 
- 5 graphic options 
- Show hidden, removed Premium and special tanks in techtree 
- Enjoy over 490 tanks in your techtree 
- Nice, centered nations button bar 
- Compatiblity with all screen resolutions 
- In-game UI mod settings (press F8 key for Changes, press F7 key for reloading Data base) 
- Allows preview and tank compare features for all tanks in game 

Because there are different options, you can style the Techtree using different combinations.

mod.name: ADU Active Dossier Uploader PlugIns
mod.description:
download the main program at the developer side

vBAddict WoT Performance Analyzer can analyze your World of Tanks Profile with the information stored locally in your Dossier cache file. Dossier files contain a summary of all of your tanks you have ever played.
vBAddict will help you to keep track on your overall battle performance WN7/WN8 efficiency, accuracy, damage ratio, damage dealt, damage assisted (radio + track), damage taken, damage per kill, experience, average battle time, mileage per map, credits and experience per minute, Platoon statistics, Mastery Badges, Marks of Excellence and even more.

config.name: Star Wars
config.description: Soundtrack from Star Wars \nComposed by John Williams

config.name: Grandpa´s Music Micro Ambiente
config.description:
Grandpa’s Music Mod (Micro Ambiente)
-This is a conversion of Noble Platoon’s Music Mod into the current format.
-Was one of my favorites and I converted it.

It does the following:
-Replaces the in battle music with sounds of combat. Planes flying overhead, machine gun fire, explosions, etc
-Replaces the music n the hangar with music from the 1940’s
-Replaces the music for Victory (Churchill, FDR, or Patton speech)
-Replaces the music for Draw (Churchill or Patton speech)
-Replaces the music for Defeat
-Intro music (before a battle) is a selection of WWII swing music and patriotic marches. Selections are 1 minute to 1.5 minutes in length and may intrude on batle for the first 30 seconds or so.

config.name: Two Steps From Hell (TSFH)
config.description: TSFH is a impressive band of classical, ethnic and rock musicians and singers, has written music for movies.

config.name: Audiomachine by Andre_V
config.description:
Replacement of music in battle. A wide range of fascinating and enlivening the morale of music from Audiomachine group. 
New music you can listen to in the hangar and in battle.

Playlist:
1.Rise of the Planets.
2.Lay Down Your Weapons.
3.Hell's battalion.
4.A Good Time to Die.
5.Lost raiders.
6.Legions of doom.
7.Mercenary revolution.
8.Siege towers.
9.Lost Raiders Drums.
10.Legions of Doom Drums.
11.Army of Kings Drums.
12.Siege Towers Drums.
13.Rubicon.
14.Project Genesis.
15.Atragon.
16.Hero's Journey.
17.A Feast for Crows.
18.Lost Generation.
19.Guardians at the Gate.
20.Hell's Battalion.
21.Lost Raiders.
22.No Return.
23.Fire And Horor.
24.100 Years War.
25.Millennium.
26.Sun and Steel.
27.Impera.
28.Evasion.
29.Tempest.
30.Satori and many more

config.name: Modern Talking by Andre_V
config.description:
The legendary German band “Modern Talking” of the 80s. Get the feeling being young and in disco again. 15 songs which you can listen in a hangar.

Du bist mein Herz, Du bist meine Seele.
Cheri Cheri Lady.
Sie können gewinnen, wenn Sie wollen.
Bruder Louie.
Geronimos Cadillac.
Atlantis ruft (S_O_S_ für die Liebe).
Möchtest Du.
Doktor für mein Herz.
Jet Airliner.
Süßer kleiner Sheila.
Angies Herz.
Diamanten nie eine Dame gemacht.
Du bist die Dame meines Herzens.
Die Engel singen in New York City.
In 100 Jahren.

mod.name: Clan Logo Remover
mod.description: will make clan logos transparent (in battle, not in hangar view) for all tanks. No more tiny icons messing up with your skins.

mod.name: Transparent Nation Decals

config.name: Camouflage of the Wargaming.net League teams
config.description:
Skins only for 8-9-10 levels, 1-7 will remain dirty because In the league are not used. By the way, therefore, the camouflage themselves on the 1-7 levels look somewhat different.

How to use:
- in the hangar in the lower right corner click the button with doubled squares and select Branded tanks.
- In the window that opens, select a camouflage for allies and opponents
- that the camouflage was only on its own tank to put up a daw "Apply only to my car"
- the selected camouflage is saved until you select the other
- to return the standard camouflage for everyone: put a checkbox "Apply only to my machine" and select "User selection"

config.name: Transparent Camouflage
config.description: removes the camouflage patterns of all tanks

mod.name: Colored penetration and ricochets on tanks
mod.description: Allows you to see where to penetrate the enemy better, or see where the enemy is penetrating you

config.description:
